author: nicolaken
msg: Remove the colored box around the credits that was making the design too heavy, and drastically simplify html.

author: mcconnell
msg: Update magic handling of content inside the target directory so that we have an assured structure common across all projects following execution of prepare.  This will allow subsequent reactor builds to execute without the requirement to look at any local project variations (e.g. when javadoc runs it will know that the src directory is ${basedir}/target/build/main for every project irrespective of the projects actual src directory.

author: nicolaken
msg: krysalis-site: minitoc config in skinconf not working  (FOR-176)
